coalesce.name: coalesce
coalesce.description: Returns the first non-null argument, if any, otherwise null.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: Returned if previous arguments are null.

coalesce.longDescription: Returns the first non-null argument, if any, otherwise null.

if.name: if
if.description: Evaluates the condition, and returns the value of either the then or else parameter.

parameters.name: then
parameters.description: The expression if the condition is true.

parameters.name: else
parameters.description: The expression if the condition is false or null.

if.longDescription: Evaluates the condition, and returns the value of either the then or else parameter.
